website_summaries.verdict: The Sony SRS-XB01 is a likable little speaker that's well designed and sounds decent enough for its budget price.
pros: The Sony SRS-XB01 is an attractively designed mini Bluetooth speaker that sounds decent for its size and is relatively inexpensive
It's shower-ready and has speakerphone capabilities
cons: Some larger "mini" speakers in this price range deliver fuller sound with higher volume

customer_reviews.title: Batteries required
customer_reviews.text: O bought this as a Christmas gift but I noticed ed it requires batteries so I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great little portable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed for the price. We bought two of these for our kids for Christmas. I’m very picky about audio quality, but I’m impressed with these speakers, considering what they are. Sound quality is good, bass reproduction is good for a small speaker, and volume range is good. I would definitely buy them again. The number of positive Amazon reviews did not steer me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Stump

customer_reviews.title: Very crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for in this case. I’ve gone through a handful of Bluetooth speakers and haven’t had any standouts. I sampled these in Target and they got my attention. This individual model is great for indoor use but doesn’t quite carry when using outdoor, compared to the bigger models. It picks up all of the bass and clarity of the music. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea, excellent sound quality and bass, great battery life, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: In my experience Sony has ALWAYS made quality speakers, so I bought this little gem based on the name alone and to be quite blunt was NOT dissapointed. It has a strap to make it the perfect portable speaker for any daytrip you can imagine and it's water resistant for that trip to the beach where you absolutely must have the tunes! Battery life is great for the size and sound quality you get (especially the extra bass Sony adds) so you can't go wrong when get this little beauty for yourself or someone you love!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound. Nice Bass.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bass for a small speaker, but I was disappointed the Color isn't Red which is what I was hoping for. It's more like Fuschia pink.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Sony still has it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker! It’s 3 powered watt’s only but with my wireless 30 band EQ I’m pushing a lot more. Extremely clear sounding if you know what your doing and how to set it up. Fantastic buy! Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Svtmemo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get a 2nd Sony bluetooth cube speaker, but those have been discontinued about a year ago so i went looking for the next small Sony speaker that looked the most like it, but the sound on this was awful and like a tin can compared to my Sony cube speaker. Also, only 6 hours battery life.
customer_reviews.author: ( ﾟ▽ﾟ)

customer_reviews.title: Good stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect super sound from the Sony XB01. However, it makes for a good stocking stuffer. Sony makes a good quality product, so I have no doubt that the speaker's build quality will be good. TBH I did not test sound or battery life. Therefore, I cannot comment. The speaker is small, perfect for your office desk, bathroom, the beach, etc. Amazon's packaging for shipping could have been better. Thankfully, the item did not come in broken.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel companion.
customer_reviews.text: Compact lightweight speaker with clear sound and good battery life. It’s water resistant, not submersible waterproof. I already own the XB20 and XB10 speakers which are great so I did not doubt this speaker would be good based on my experience with those. I wanted something smaller for travel and this is perfect. I got the hermitshell brand case for this which fits this speaker like a glove. For personal listening, price, quality, design, and ease of use, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: K. Saboda

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay charged!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was pleased with this little portable, bluetooth speaker until it stopped taking a charge shortly after purchase. Normally I like Sony products so maybe I just received a dud. Would be nice if I could return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sounds  like Sony!! Sorry! Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Small regular speaker..shipping was horrible. Everything is outside of the main package. Looks like 2nd hand item. Doesn’t feels like a new item. Distorted bass if you raise the volume after 80%. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Shishir

customer_reviews.title: If comes or not with the charger and cord
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with charger and neither the little cord to hang. I’m always under the impression Sony products are super good but this time I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jair Semora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Got this to listen to podcasts in bed. I needed something a little louder than my phone. I have another high quality speaker, but it sounded like it had too much base (music sounds great on it, but not conversation). I love the color combo! This speaker is an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rb123006

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but Mighty great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to see how small this was when it arrived (smaller than an average tomato- see pic), and thought to myself that this was a wasted purchase. I should have remembered DON'T JUDGE A BOOK BY IT'S COVER!! This is really small but the sound is amazing, even the bass is great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Alessi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First speaker died on the second day, returned it and the second speaker died on the third day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sony Sound for Its Size
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical if this little speaker would sound as good as my other SRS-XB32 speaker, which is much larger and has extra bass. However, this small speaker does the job well for what it is and still has that Sony "sound." There's no cheap tint that a lot of other bluetooth speakers seem to have. Good quality but keep in mind, it's a tiny speaker. Battery life is average, so I keep mine plugged in near my workspace.
customer_reviews.author: Lskcar1408

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very loud at all! I got it for my bathroom and it sucked! It was fine up until the last time I charged it it died 5 minutes after full charge. Not worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Baden

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so i could listen to music off my phone when outside swimming. It is perfect. Small, charges quickly, holds a charge for several hours. I place it on the pool deck while swimming. The vibrations make it move a little. Last night it actually vibrated itself off the deck into the pool! It was submerged 1-2 minutes before i could rescue it, and no damage. Sounded as good after the near-drowning as it did brand new. I love this item so much. It stays charged for several hours. It is a very good value for the price. Could the sound be better? Of course. But i only paid $23 for this.
customer_reviews.author: kim_allyn

customer_reviews.title: Why the crappy packaging!
customer_reviews.text: So I already knew this was a good speaker from already owning one but I ordered another one in blue nice vibrant color and this is a very small speaker so don't expect top notch sound/volume but it's very decent! The only problem I have is the care and quality in shipping my speaker😳🤔😡 why send it all trashed in box!???? Anyways it had no missing items and charged just fine it looks new just confused why this Item has so many people with already opened items in box apon arrival 🤔🤔
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The most annoying ever! It stays on and never automatically turns off even after whole day of not being connected. It also steals the sound from your phone even though you already transferred to headset or phone speaker. I bought this because of brand but seriously there are cheaper ones that are made with intelligence.
customer_reviews.author: mccoysuper

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Portable
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker because it is so compact and portable. However, I really wish that the volume was louder. It is not much louder than the speaker on my cell phone, so hearing podcasts while brushing my teeth and showering is not as easy as I'd hoped it'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Daria S.

customer_reviews.title: Size matters, but don't let it fool you
customer_reviews.text: Like: Compact size, and fair sound quality for its size. Built feels robust and able to withstand a couple of bumps. Dislike: Sound quality although its fair, would have expected a bit more from Sony, but once again in such a reduced space I guess I may not be able to compare it to my Bose Micro SoundLink's fidelity. Overall: for the price tag, size and built... the sound quality is very decent. I would buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ricardo Martinez Vega

customer_reviews.title: Does not work after a few days
customer_reviews.text: I probably used this thing 5 times inside and outside my home and the volume just got lower and lower every time. I chose this item specifically because it's a Sony product but honestly it's absolute garbage and Sony should be embarrassed. I'm really confused by all the great reviews because mine just simply never worked properly. I'll just have to invest in a much better product at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Noonie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Lightweight to carry around. I use it 4 days a week for about an hour each time and the battery can lasts me at least a week. I don’t know when it’s low battery and it’s only died on me once. The sound is big for its size. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie5ever

customer_reviews.title: Worst sound and worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: I figured since it was a Sony device it would have a nice loud sound to it even for such a small unit. It sounds as loud as my iPhone and not any louder this is the worst purchase I’ve ever made and I hope that they refund my money and let me return it
customer_reviews.author: latisha kocur

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: This small, compact, sound is a great way to take your music everywhere. Its bluetooth connection is easy and the sound is great. I would recommend and buy again as gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Louise DeCoster

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality sound. Pretty loud for such a small speaker. It is supposed to be water resistant. But not going to try that out lol. Also comes with a little wrist strap. Very pretty teal color... also bought the black one and had it on hand to take picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Do not pair; No stereo sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these speakers but for some reason, we can't connect both speakers to create the stereo sound with Speaker Add Function. How it's advertised: UPGRADE THE AUDIO: Wirelessly connect 2 speakers and achieve stereo sound with Speaker Add Function if someone knows how we can do this please let us know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: Not being a tech geek, it did take me awhile to figure out how to connect my phone & Google Puxelbook to the speaker but once I did, it's very easy to sync to both via Bluetooth. Only setback is when I get phone calls, I still have a problem talking and hearing the callers without turning the whole thing off! But I will give this 5 stars because the sound is wonderful and so portable!
customer_reviews.author: Sunlion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office! This is not meant for bigger spaces. My office is a normal sized office and I am on constant calls and video conference meetings. I can't have loud music playing in the background. This is quality sound for my space, long lasting, easy connection, and at an amazing price. I had at least one co-worker order it after she heard mine. Great investment for those of us with an office or cubicle life.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: The volume only works on low
customer_reviews.text: I had this speaker for 1 month. I use it while riding my bike. As I was riding my bike the volume cut down to half the sound and would not go back up. I turned it off and on and the volume is still very low. The volume will not go high at all anymore. I'm very disappointed with this purchase bc I just bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ericia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It surprised me how good quality this was for the money. Didn't spend a lot of money and got exactly what i wanted. It was super easy to pair with bluetooth. I usually have a hard time setting up those kinds of things but this is super simple.
customer_reviews.author: ASosa#1

customer_reviews.title: So unimpressed...
customer_reviews.text: So unimpressed with this product. It's so quiet... I had a Popclick before, but decided to go with Sony because I thought the sound quality would be better... Not so much. Not nearly as loud as the Popclick. The battery is dead everytime I go back to use it, even though i charged it the day before. Just not happy with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Camille R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and paired it with my phone. Easy. Sound quality is pretty damn good for a $20 speaker about the size of a tennis ball (though it's not a sphere). If I have anything to comment on after using a while, I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: RoBear

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom at work (warehouse) it didn't last even until lunchtime, she now uses it in her truck going to and from work. I will have to get a bigger one for her to use at her job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: China no more
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product. However. If I had known it was from China. I would never have purchased. In my future, I will not purchase products from China. We need to bring manufacturing back to US. I love Amazon. But China no more.
customer_reviews.author: barbara walner

customer_reviews.title: it arrived and didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to charge it with multiple different cords and the one that it came with and it didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gibson

customer_reviews.title: It's Sony so you know it's good
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this for $23. I have a larger Sony that sounds AMAZING that I dropped over $100 for and the battery has gotten a little weaker over MANY years.... so I wanted just a backup. This is very small and will not blow your hair back but it packs a punch for it's size. Haven't used it enough to really judge the battery life but it appears to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy, very portable, long lasting battery, decent sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great price to an extremely portable speaker for listening to my audio books. I have 2, different colors, so I always have a fully charged onevready for wherever I go. Easy controls. Probably not the best for rocking out on music. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing...and a steal at $18
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing for its tiny size. Perfect to toss in a suitcase for (travel) or to move from room to room. And, it's splash (not water) resistant. Exceeds any possible expectations for price/size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Menaker

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile, I was originally discouraged by some reviews then I turned in on and found that it was by far the best little speaker I have tried so far. Sound clear and loud, easy charge, easy wifi, easy Alexa and super easy to loose
customer_reviews.author: Cici Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Low price and name brand
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad speaker for the price and name brand. You can get better speakers for about the same price but if your about the name brands and on a budget then get this. Perfect for on the go sound is great for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: carlos lira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a small portable speaker that sounded loud. This did not disappoint, it charges quickly and packs a big punch. It's nice and small that I can carry in my smaller backpack and pairing it with bluetooth was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Anel M

customer_reviews.title: Low sound
customer_reviews.text: Can barely hear when half way up and then if you raise volume a touch, it becomes too loud for background noise at work to keep at your work station.
customer_reviews.author: Medic0513

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this speaker; I would appreciate a louder volume, but for the price and size, it has been serving me well most of the time. I use it to listen to audio talks on youtube, not so much for music.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Second One
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Good size. The hands-free, for use with the phone, sound quality is excellent. I use it in an older model Silverado (no Bluetooth). For the money, it’s a great little speaker and system.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Sony still got it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, you can tell by the weight and the build quality. Bass is impressive. My son loved it for a gift and it's definitely better than the generic quality speakers at half the price. I'd buy it again for myself in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I carry this thing around all of the time. Yard work. Yoga classes. Bbq’s. I’m not a sound quality snob but It’s definitely not bad! Should have gotten a few of these instead of Alexa’s. Oh well. It’s been in damp settings (wet grass and a few rain sprinkles here and there, nothing most products won’t hold up to so I can’t attest to water resistance at this time. I’ve owned it for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: compact, good sound & features
customer_reviews.text: It's light and small. Just what you need to travel with. It doesn't blast an unpleasant jingle when you fire it up, just a couple beeps and none when you shut it down. It also has an 1/8" stereo mini plug connection. All in all, a great unit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: artist dude

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an awesome speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Stepdaughters asked for a wireless speaker for Christmas. The price and quality of these little speakers just couldn’t be beat! Great purchase and definitely worth it. They love their speakers!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl🏔

customer_reviews.title: Okish
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was a lot smaller than I thought it would be and it's not super loud. The sound quality is ok. I was disappointed that it didn't with any instructions and it was really dirty. I felt like I have just bought it from a grungy second-hand store.
customer_reviews.author: LCP129

customer_reviews.title: Weak, weak, weak, very low audio
customer_reviews.text: This thing has almost no audio output...the speaker "hole" in most cell phones will be much loudeer than this "speaker". With that in mind, not sure what the purpose of this thing is...it's got clean bassy audio at low volume though, so there's that...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anderegg

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: This product sounds like a record player but without the charm of a record player...... I was so disappointed in this product. It needed to be plugged in ALL THE TIME or it wouldn’t work. The volume was inconsistent, etc. I could go on but I have already wasted enough time on this product. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Butternuts

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My box was also opened in the packaging. Mine actually didn't have the the usb charger. But I bought the cheaper chinese speakers as someone suggested. Those were horrible, not synced, low volume. That basically is my comparison as the chinese speakers, three I bought, none were this synced and the others were too much base. This sony one is pretty synced up as bluetooth and sounds like my earphones. Although I would have been happy with a renewed one, since the USB was gone from my package.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: good deal at 14 bucks
customer_reviews.text: it was only 14 bucks, so I didn't expect too much from it, its nice, very small , I use it with Alexa dot in the bathroom [Bluetooth] so its perfect for that, but not very load when in an outdoor environment,
customer_reviews.author: Glitch242

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mini speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work where I can’t play music loudly, and this is perfect. The sound quality is great. It does get loud enough to fill a small room as well, and it is my go to for hotel stays. Battery life is great. Very impressive for such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Streck

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my office for my satellite radio. I charge it overnight and the battery barely last for the 10 hours that I use it during the day. I wish it had a much longer battery life. Sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is horrible! Cut out constantly! Very disappointed, it was not loud at all! We thought it would be a good speaker because that’s Sony name. NOT. RETURNING IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Amereihn

customer_reviews.title: Crappy baterry
customer_reviews.text: It was good at first then the battery just didnt last long. I got 2, pne just died on me, the other need to be constantly in plugged coz battery dpnt hold charge anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sony speaker
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bit skeptical when I got it. That changed when I saw and heard the speaker. Was a gift for my mom's birthday. She loves it. Would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small
customer_reviews.text: If you are limited on space, this speaker is a great choice. The sound is just fine if you are not an elitist audiophile. I do wish it were water resistant or water proof.
customer_reviews.author: SKi

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice little speaker. I use mine for a CW Ham radio, so sound quality is not really important. Price is attractive, but battery life could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Ax.

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good little speaker...i use it when i watch tv or YouTube on my phone ..it has good sound ...i tied mine to my phone holder
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Very ample sound
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker. Doesn't take up a lot of room, fits in the palm of my hand, easy to use and reset, visually attractive, durable case,......it's Sony!
customer_reviews.author: dhart

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect device
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a desk speaker. Can easily switch between a workstation and phone. I do wish the battery life was better; however, it is plugged in with dc power most of the time. It’s portability is great with the exception of short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Sounds!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little speaker with big power and clarity! Love it. Who said it requires batteries? It doesn’t and takes seconds to sync to your devices
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Not bassy but sounds fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear highs, rich mids and just right amount of bass for my liking. But if you're expecting some extra booomming bass then you'll probably be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yu

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is okay for a speaker of its size, nothing remarkable. The problem I have though is that it quickly would keep dying whenever I was using it and now the only way I can use it is if I keep it charging the whole time I use it, so it's not exactly portable. Like 10 min of life before it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Raja Jagnandan

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my car to listen to YouTube and podcast instead of the radio. Works well. Small size good for confined spaces like my car. Fits in the palm of your hand. Not as much bass as the larger Bluetooth speakers and battery life seems more limited as is expected for a smaller unit. Volume is good. Overall a good value for the price and performance. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bushido

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last & sound fades in/out
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father’s Xmas gift. It only lasted a couple of months. Battery doesn’t last even though it’s fully charged. The speaker would fade on & off. The sound quality is mediocre. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this little guy is pretty good. I wouldn’t suggest using in a big area. It’s not great at higher volumes, but for smaller, personal spaces it’s great. I use it at work and for the price it’s perfect. The water resistance hasn’t been tested, but that’s not a necessity for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fitgrl33

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something a bit louder than my cell phone. This may actually be quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works for the price. Sound distortions when high volume. So just try to keep a regular volume. My toddler walks around with it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker but it stopped working all of a sudden...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker in early May as a gift for my husband to use as a portable speaker during his workouts. It was working great, the sound was very nice and easy to carry around. Then all of a sudden it stopped working, it won't charge or turn on at all. I am disappointed because it is actually a nice speaker but I will need to request a refund. Hopefully, no one else has this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hudson

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: for the size of the item, it sounds great, I like that is small and it can take it anywhere and it sounds great. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: kcinlb

customer_reviews.title: It is so Little!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is super tiny and lightweight but does an amazing job with sound quality and level. Great purchase. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great small and light portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t beat it. It’s loud for it’s size and the sound quality is great. I wasn’t expecting it to be as loud as it is for the size and weight. For on the go mega portable speakers it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Harry J

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is very well made. It works great, the Bluetooth syncs quickly and easily, and the battery works for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Don't pick it for Zoom speaker with microphone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to have table speaker+microphone for family Zoom calls, and was deeply disappointed. The sound quality for voice is worse than the phone speaker, and people on the other side can hardly hear us. Music quality is okay, but that was not the purpose. I'm going to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Anton K.

customer_reviews.title: Sony XB01 Bluetooth Compact Portable Speaker Black (SRSXB01/B)
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with the quality of sound of the Bluetooth speaker. I take it several places from the living room to the bedroom to the bathroom. The only thing that I don't like about it is the size of the charger cord. It's too short. It's made entertaining so much easier. We use music often.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Kellermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last.
customer_reviews.text: It was good in the beginning. Now it is losing battery power quickly with either muffled sound or low volume. I have resorted to my cheap reliable BT speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: So small yet so Big!
customer_reviews.text: For a little speaker this thing puts off quite a lot of sound. Very impressed with the quality, but it's a Sony, so I guess that explains a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Wish the charge held a bit longer. I use at the office for music 9 hours a day and after 1.5 days it needs charging.. easy to charge though.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great speaker. I bought it to take with me whenever i need some theme music! I used it this weekend a few times. It was easy to pair with..sound was good. Id buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimeross

customer_reviews.title: sound id good
customer_reviews.text: sound is good, I have only used this a few times, I have only had this a week so I can't really say much about waterproofing, if the battery life is better then the last no name one I have.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable device for the home or for the light traveler
customer_reviews.text: My wife takes it all through the house when she is cleaning and also when she goes bike riding and says it’s great sound and cool since it barely takes any space in her bag.

customer_reviews.title: It’s small if that’s a consideration.
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I expected and I don’t use it enough to comment on battery life. It sounds nicer than my phone when I play music on my phone through it.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok

customer_reviews.title: Quality for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to use it in a pool area at home. You cannot be far than five feet to hear the music. The speaker is ok but not for the purpose I bought it. It is good to use it at home or closed environment. For the price I cannot expect more.

customer_reviews.author: Jen83

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: We bought it on Dec 4, today is May 2. We are really confused and shocked about the battery: we charged one whole night, when we used it, it went down in less than 20 minutes. When it went down, even we charged it while using it, it did not work. If there is a chance that we can get an replacement, we would like to give another try.
